description: "Although published in the mid-19th century, this map is based on Batavia (Jakarta) in c.1740. It focuses on the city’s castle and streets (in red), but also shows the fields of crops and the wetlands surrounding the city (in blue)."
title: "Kaart van Batavia omstreeks honderdvijfentwintigjaren geleden overgebracht in het jaar 1864"
